author: kalgiz
body:
## PR Summary

Add fallback to en-US culture in Update-Help command when help data for the requested culture is not available.

If help data after running command Update-Help was not installed for the current culture, there would be performed another try for 'en-US' culture.

Remove call for Update-Help with en-US culture in case the current culture is different from tests.

Fixes: #6217

comments.author: kalgiz
comments.body: I am wondering what test to add here. Passing -UiCulture other than en-US explicite raises the exception "HelpCultureNotSupported" and probably this is the expected behavior. We want the Update-Help to fallback to en-US only when there is no -UICulture parameter and the installed locale is other than en-US.
